content.question: The original sample was observed to produce <math alttext="3072" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3072</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> decays during the first <math alttext="30" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>30</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> minutes of the experiment. Approximately how many decays should be expected during the next <math alttext="45" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>45</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> minutes?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
